articles.title: Pakistan Backs Trump for Nobel Peace Prize He’s Long Craved - Bloomberg
articles.description: Pakistan said it will nominate US President Donald Trump for the Nobel Peace Prize, a move that may annoy rival India while building stronger ties to Washington.
